participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the silver lining in any situation.
participant_1.background: Emily is a graphic designer who enjoys painting and exploring nature during her free time.

participant_2.background: Jake works as a software engineer and is passionate about gaming and outdoor adventures.
